                  BEEP_Init PROC
;;;16     //蜂鸣器初始化
;;;17     void BEEP_Init(void)
000000  480b              LDR      r0,|L1.48|
;;;18     {
;;;19     	RCC->APB2ENR|=1<<3;    	//使能PORTB时钟	   	  
000002  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
000004  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
000008  4909              LDR      r1,|L1.48|
00000a  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;20     	GPIOB->CRH&=0XFFFFFFF0; 
00000c  4809              LDR      r0,|L1.52|
00000e  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]
000010  f020000f          BIC      r0,r0,#0xf
000014  4908              LDR      r1,|L1.56|
000016  f8c10c04          STR      r0,[r1,#0xc04]
;;;21     	GPIOB->CRH|=0X00000003;	//PB.8 推挽输出    
00001a  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00001c  f8d00c04          LDR      r0,[r0,#0xc04]
000020  f0400003          ORR      r0,r0,#3
000024  4903              LDR      r1,|L1.52|
000026  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;22     	BEEP=0;					//关闭蜂鸣器输出
000028  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00002a  4904              LDR      r1,|L1.60|
00002c  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;23     }
00002e  4770              BX       lr
;;;24     
                          ENDP

                  |L1.48|
                          DCD      0x40021000
